body: They really should have made the time skip a bit more noticeable... not like they'll get pregnant the same day... also no cucking here... two of the three got boyfriends and the one just loved going to town as the school carousel.
This is a great premise. Lets just get all the girls pregnant in school, no real downside to be honest.

I don't think you have a clue either, then, that nhentai doesn't tag shit, they're simply scrapping it from somewhere else. You're complaining on the wrong site. And the commenter below me is correct, this manga is actually tagged male:harem, but since nhentai lacks differentiation between male tags and female tags, it gets confusing. Your explanation of "harem" tag is also wrong, all it takes for a gallery to be tagged as "harem" are 1 person having consensual sex with at least 3 others, it doesn't imply focus to a particular character.
Failed to see the issue with the tags ngl. Its taghed ginely.  A harem of highschool boys fucks 3 girls. Need a gangbang tag tho or gruppen.
Cheating since black hair chick let dudes other then her new bf fuck her and swinging needed...

@Odyssues246 I get you think you're being smart, the reason this isn't a harem is because harem implies multiple characters being focused on one central "harem master". This is just a fucking orgy it's not a harem. Don't act like you can explain shit when you don't have a clue.

The bubbly cutie who's not-so-secretly a huge slut, the shy cute who has to have her sluttines unleashed first and the dominant girl who has her eye on the shy dude, how tf does this hit all my types at once? Also the wholesome relationship stuff is a surprisingly nice Touch!

Funny how people in comment complain about the incorrect tag when they should have know that the tag harem apply to both male and female. It been tag like this for many years and people did not complain and now all of a sudden complain it wrong tag. You people just got piss off because you felt being trick into thinking it one boy many girl harem type.
